    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15601</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Fiumi in Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Rivers in Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse in Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleuves en Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rios em Europa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποταμοί στην Ευρώπη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ríos en Europa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo Learning Object aiuta gli studenti a ricordare i nomi di alcuni fiumi europei.</string>
            <string language="en">This LO helps students remeber the names of some European rivers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">rivers</string>
            <string language="en">rivers</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE Hilfen Kursteilnehmer remeber die 
Namen von einigen europäischen Flüssen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BAS remeber d'étudiants d'aides les noms de 
quelques fleuves européens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este remeber BAIXO dos estudantes das ajudas os 
nomes de alguns rios europeus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO βοηθά τους σπουδαστές remeber τα 
ονόματα μερικών ευρωπαϊκών ποταμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este remeber BAJO de los estudiantes de las ayudas
los nombres de algunos ríos europeos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flüsse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fleuves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rios</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποταμοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ríos</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">We can use this LO as a selfassessment interactive exercise where students match the names of the rivers with pictures.</string>
